text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Eligible individual" means an individual who:
is at least 18 years old and under the age of 65 years at the time of the initial eligibility determination; and
has a severe chronic or permanent physical disability that precludes or significantly impairs the individual's independent performance of essential activities of daily living, self-care, or mobility.
"Financial assistance" means a payment the Department makes to an eligible individual for attendant care services.
